title: Ep. 502 - Mass (Media-Generated) Hysteria
description:
Coronavirus reaches the U.S. President Trump is playing it down, Democrats are playing it up, and no one can tell whether this is much ado about nothing or we’re all going to die. We will examine the mass media-generated hysteria. Then, speaking of not knowing whether you’re alive or dead, Joe Biden gets some good news from a new poll out in South Carolina, two different kinds of Republicans are voting for Bernie, and finally the Mailbag!

Check out The Cold War: What We Saw, a new podcast written and presented by Bill Whittle at https://www.dailywire.com/coldwar. In Part 1 we peel back the layers of mystery cloaking the Terror state run by the Kremlin, and watch as America takes its first small steps onto the stage of world leadership.
